explanation: Agent A is correct. With #define HAVE_GMTIME_R 1 in the project configuration, the preprocessor will select the #elif defined(HAVE_GMTIME_R) branch and the #else branch (the pNow = gmtime(&t); ... code) will never be included in any translation unit of this project build. MISRA C 2023 Rule 2.1 requires that a project shall not contain unreachable code; code that is excluded from all translation units by the project’s preprocessor configuration is effectively unreachable in that project and therefore violates the rule. (If the macro were not defined for this project configuration the code would be reachable in that configuration; the rule applies to the actual project build configuration.)
